duties_responsibilities.duty: Conduct design feasibility and cost analysis, strength calculations, material selection, and part construction.
Design and develop components, parts, and systems in the area of specialty per established quality/development schedule guidelines.
Implement design ideas/features by preparing, checking, and issuing 2D and 3D drawings/layouts, calculations, and analysis.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Mechanical or Electrical Engineering (or related field)
